blogPost.excerpt: MagicPattern evolved into a visuals toolbox with 10+ tools. Create unique patterns, gradients, blobs & much more graphics with our 1-click generators. Almost 1 new tool is added every month 🤯
blogPost.body: MagicPattern evolved into a visuals toolbox with 10+ tools. Create unique patterns, gradients, blobs & much more graphics with our 1-click generators. Almost 1 new tool is added every month 🤯
blogPost.title: MagicPattern Toolbox - 10+ tools for instant visuals generation
blogPost.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: MagicPattern演变成一个拥有10多种工具的可视化工具箱。使用我们的一键生成器，创建独特的图案，渐变，斑点和更多的图形。每个月几乎都会增加一个新的工具 🤯。
MagicPattern演變成一個擁有10多種工具的可視化工具箱。使用我們的一鍵生成器，創建獨特的圖案，漸變，斑點和更多的圖形。每個月幾乎都會增加一個新的工具 🤯。
